channel.title: Engineers United Docs
channel.description: Recent content on Engineers United Docs

item.description: Design Team Phase 1 Create and finalize logo Create and finalize brand Make brand guidelines Make event flyers Make sticker design Make badge design Make volunteer promotion flyer Make Website mockup Make Livesite mockup Phase 2 Get Speaker schedule from external relations Make speaker infographic Get judge panel and make bios from external relations Get Staff bios Get Tech Sponsors Get food sponsors from external relations Get Registration time Get prizes Phase 3 Make event map with president Make T-Shirt design Make guide book template Collaborate and finalize the 5 guidebooks (sponsors, attendees, volunteers, mentors, and hackers) with the president Continuous Make 20 social media posts Post other Hackathons on social media Post on Facebook, Instagram, and Snapchat each week 5 bio posts 2-3 registration posts 2-3 speaker posts 2-3 food posts 1 prize post 1 volunteer post 2-3 sponsor posts

External Relations Find and Finalize 5 judges Reach out to 10 potential mentors a week Create a workshop schedule Find 10-20 workshop speakers Contact 10 tech sponsors a week Contact 2 food sponsors a week/get quotes Get T-Shirt quotes Get Sticker sponsor Get Badge quotes Contact News Sources

President Phase 1 Finalize Date Find and Finalize Venue Find and Finalize Tables, Chairs, and Cords Find and Finalize Internet Find and Finalize Power Create initial Budget Sheet Phase 2 Talk to CSCE about collaborating Sponsorship Mentors Volunteers Talk to the College of Engineering Sponsorship Mentors Volunteers Talk to UIS about collaborating Sponsorship Talk to DAIR about collaborating Sponsorship Talk to the President about collaborating Sponsorship Phase 3 Collaborate with the brand director to make an event map Innovate and check on other processes
